name: Find Me!
description:
DESCRIPTION

Find me videogame 2D plattaforms with a Style gothic but adorable!!

 You can defeat the bosses to move forward! 

You are a voodoo toy that is looking for the person it represents. Can you find me?

FEATURES

Not to the violence!

You can kill bosses without having to physically attack them, Your ability is what makes the difference!

Today and forever...Thanks for to play this Demo!
